attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many elderly, those suffering chronic illness and low paid youngesters are strugling to pay prescription charges and there for are risking their health due to not qualifiying for help or free prescriptions I am campaigning for free prescriptions for the UK to fall in line with wales who will have free prescriptions from 1st April 2007

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
